1.spoken_text: I'm ready to assist. I can move us forward to the next slide.

2.spoken_text: If we need to recap, I can take us back to the previous one.

3.spoken_text: I can change the slides based on context or keyword. Here is your architecture view. It really captures the system design beautifully.

4.spoken_text: I can also take the lead, and run through the slides automatically.

5.spoken_text: I'll do everything while keeping the live subtitles running, so everyone can follow along.

6.spoken_text: I can also track your time. Say Friday Start Timer

7.spoken_text: I can summarize the meeting for you regardless its a Zoom, Teams or an in-person meeting

8.spoken_text: Finally, You can ask me any question about the presentation and i can answer.
